data_table.description: This subject consent data table contains subject IDs, consent group information, subject aliases, and affection status for early-onset obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
Disease-Specific (Obsessive Compulsive Disorder and other psychiatric conditions) (DS-OCD-OPC)

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject for early-onset obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD)
